original_text: People from all the world's nations will bring their beautiful and valuable things into the city.
korean_text: 사람들이 만국의 영광과 존귀를 가지고 그리로 들어가겠고

sentences.original_text: People from all the world's nations
will bring their beautiful and valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아름답고 귀한 것들을 가져올 것입니다
